name: volo-app-template
description: Full-stack React + Hono template with Firebase Auth, Neon DB, and Cloudflare deployment

scripts.dev:start: concurrently "cd server && pnpm dev" "cd ui && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: cd ui && pnpm build && cd ../server && pnpm build
scripts.deploy: cd server && wrangler deploy && echo 'Frontend deployment: Connect your Git repo to Cloudflare Pages'
